original_text:
Your eyes are too pure to look on evil;
    you cannot tolerate wrongdoing.
Why then do you tolerate the treacherous?
    Why are you silent while the wicked
    swallow up those more righteous than themselves?
korean_text: 주께서는 눈이 정결하시므로 악을 차마 보지 못하시며 패역을 차마 보지 못하시거늘 어찌하여 거짓된 자들을 방관하시며 악인이 자기보다 의로운 사람을 삼키는데도 잠잠하시나이까

sentences.original_text: Why then do you tolerate the treacherous
Why are you silent while the wicked
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 악인이 자기보다 의인을 삼킬 때에

sentences.original_text: swallow up those more righteous than themselves
